00094 void DATDataTest::ScanDateTest()
00095 {
00096         DateTime dt = DateTime::GetCurrentDateTime();
00097         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(data->SetScanDate(dt));
00098         DateTime dt2 = data->GetScanDate();
00099         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dt.Time() == dt2.Time());
00100         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dt.Date() == dt2.Date());
00101         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dt.IsUTC() == dt2.IsUTC());
00102 }

00116 void DATDataTest::GlobalGridTest()
00117 {
00118         FGridCoords grid;
00119         grid.lowerleft.x = 1.0f;
00120         grid.lowerleft.y = 1.2f;
00121         grid.lowerright.x = 11.0f;
00122         grid.lowerright.y = 14.2f;
00123         grid.upperright.x = 111.0f;
00124         grid.upperright.y = 114.2f;
00125         grid.upperleft.x = 1001.0f;
00126         grid.upperleft.y = 1200.2f;
00127 
00128         FRegion reg = grid;
00129         data->SetGlobalGrid(DATData::GridError, reg);
00130         FGridCoords grid2 = (FGridCoords)data->GetGlobalGrid();
00131 
00132         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(grid2.lowerleft.x == 1.0f);
00133         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(grid2.lowerleft.y == 1.2f);
00134         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(grid2.lowerright.x == 11.0f);
00135         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(grid2.lowerright.y == 14.2f);
00136         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(grid2.upperright.x == 111.0f);
00137         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(grid2.upperright.y == 114.2f);
00138         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(grid2.upperleft.x == 1001.0f);
00139         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(grid2.upperleft.y == 1200.2f);
00140         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data->GetGlobalGridStatus() == DATData::GridError);
00141 }
00142 
00143 void DATDataTest::SubgridTest()
00144 {
00145         FGridCoords grid;
00146         grid.lowerleft.x = 1.0f;
00147         grid.lowerleft.y = 1.2f;
00148         grid.lowerright.x = 11.0f;
00149         grid.lowerright.y = 14.2f;
00150         grid.upperright.x = 111.0f;
00151         grid.upperright.y = 114.2f;
00152         grid.upperleft.x = 1001.0f;
00153         grid.upperleft.y = 1200.2f;
00154 
00155         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data->GetSubgridCnt() == 0);
00156 
00157         data->AddSubgrid(DATData::GridOK, (FRegion)grid);
00158         FGridCoords grid2 = grid;
00159         grid2.lowerleft.x = 2.0f;
00160         data->AddSubgrid(DATData::GridManualAdjust, (FRegion)grid2);
00161 
00162         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data->GetSubgridCnt() == 2);
00163 
00164         FGridCoords grid3 = (FGridCoords)data->GetSubgrid(0);
00165         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(grid3.lowerleft.x == 1.0f);
00166         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(grid3.lowerleft.y == 1.2f);
00167         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(grid3.lowerright.x == 11.0f);
00168         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(grid3.lowerright.y == 14.2f);
00169         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(grid3.upperright.x == 111.0f);
00170         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(grid3.upperright.y == 114.2f);
00171         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(grid3.upperleft.x == 1001.0f);
00172         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(grid3.upperleft.y == 1200.2f);
00173         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data->GetSubgridStatus(0) == DATData::GridOK);
00174 
00175         FGridCoords grid4 = (FGridCoords)data->GetSubgrid(1);
00176         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(grid4.lowerleft.x == 2.0f);
00177         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data->GetSubgridStatus(1) == DATData::GridManualAdjust);
00178 
00179         data->ClearSubgrids();
00180 
00181         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data->GetSubgridCnt() == 0);
00182 }

00198 void DATDataTest::AddGridAlignmentAlgorithmParameterTest()
00199 {
00200         ParameterNameValueType nvt;
00201         nvt.SetName(L"Nirvana");
00202         nvt.SetValueInt32(1234);
00203         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(data->AddGridAlignmentAlgorithmParameter(nvt));
00204 }
00205 
00206 void DATDataTest::FindGridAlignmentAlgorithmParameterTest()
00207 {
00208         ParameterNameValueType nvt;
00209         nvt.SetName(L"Nirvana");
00210         nvt.SetValueInt32(1234);
00211         data->AddGridAlignmentAlgorithmParameter(nvt);
00212         nvt.SetName(L"Hole");
00213         nvt.SetValueText(L"OU812");
00214         data->AddGridAlignmentAlgorithmParameter(nvt);
00215 
00216         ParameterNameValueType nvtResult;
00217         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data->FindGridAlignmentAlgorithmParameter(L"Hole", nvtResult));
00218         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvtResult.GetValueText() == L"OU812");
00219         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data->FindGridAlignmentAlgorithmParameter(L"Nirvana", nvtResult));
00220         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvtResult.GetValueInt32() == 1234);
00221         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data->FindGridAlignmentAlgorithmParameter(L"Missing", nvtResult) == false);
00222 }
00223 
00224 void DATDataTest::GetGridAlignmentAlgorithmParametersTest()
00225 {
00226         ParameterNameValueType nvt;
00227         nvt.SetName(L"Nirvana");
00228         nvt.SetValueInt32(94061);
00229         data->AddGridAlignmentAlgorithmParameter(nvt);
00230         nvt.SetName(L"Pi");
00231         nvt.SetValueFloat(3.141592654f);
00232         data->AddGridAlignmentAlgorithmParameter(nvt);
00233 
00234         ParameterNameValueTypeVector params;
00235         data->GetGridAlignmentAlgorithmParameters(params);
00236         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(params.size() == 2);
00237         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(params[0].GetName() == L"Nirvana");
00238         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(params[0].GetValueInt32() == 94061);
00239 }
00240 
00241 void DATDataTest::ClearGridAlignmentAlgorithmParametersTest()
00242 {
00243         ParameterNameValueType nvt;
00244         nvt.SetName(L"Nirvana");
00245         nvt.SetValueInt32(94061);
00246         data->AddGridAlignmentAlgorithmParameter(nvt);
00247         nvt.SetName(L"Pi");
00248         nvt.SetValueFloat(3.141592654f);
00249         data->AddGridAlignmentAlgorithmParameter(nvt);
00250 
00251         ParameterNameValueTypeVector params;
00252         data->GetGridAlignmentAlgorithmParameters(params);
00253         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(params.size() == 2);
00254         data->ClearGridAlignmentAlgorithmParameters();
00255         data->GetGridAlignmentAlgorithmParameters(params);
00256         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(params.size() == 0);
00257 }
